mapper.insert: insert into requirement(name, project_id, module_id, plan_id, "describe", acceptance_criteria, priority, create_by, create_time, requirement_phase, requirement_status, handle_by) VALUES ( #{name}, #{projectId}, #{moduleId}, #{planId}, #{describe}, #{acceptanceCriteria}, #{priority}, #{createBy}, #{createTime},'${requirementPhase}','${requirementStatus}', #{handleBy})
mapper.select: select a.id, a.name, a.project_id, a.module_id, a.plan_id, a."describe", a.acceptance_criteria, a.priority, a.create_by, a.handle_by, a.create_time, a.requirement_phase, a.requirement_status, b.name project_name, c.name moduleName, d.name planName, e.name handle_by_name, f.name create_by_name from "requirement" a left join project b on a.project_id = b.id left join module c on c.id = a.module_id left join plan d on a.plan_id = d.id left join "user" e on e.id = a.handle_by left join "user" f on f.id = a.create_by where a.id=#{id}
